content.description:
Read this public sign.

[Traditional-character version]

報章期刊閱畢後請放回原處

[Simplified-character version]

报章期刊阅毕后请放回原处
content.question: What is the purpose of the sign?

choices.label: To give directions to a particular location
To request cooperation from the users of a service
To post the penalty for violating a regulation

content.answer: To request cooperation from the users of a service

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
